name: Pic-A-Boo
description:
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!

You enter a mediocre looking theme park ride to discover it's not as crappy as you thought...

-Use your cursor or a light gun to sent those spirits packing!
-Trust your camera, use it to find the sneaky lil Ghouls. 

Ghosts will only show up on your camera's viewfinder, position your reticule over them and snap away! 

This project was designed to be a part of the UoN Gameyam, made by the 'Gradu-A-Team'

-Credits-
